name: Color Cube (Lucki)
description:
Color Cube,

is a game all around color and a cube.

It is not very easy because you have to check your color and jump and run on dificult platforms!

This game was made with a friend "Philias Fogg"!

And we had some demo testers: Jaguar_01,  Otter_137, monkey_19, Millo!

This game is for free and I hope you have fun with it!

*Important: Its not ready yet!
